historicContext.text: For the general public as well as for those with engineering or technical interests, the technological components at Fairmount made the waterworks a unique wonder — the turning of the massive waterwheels, the action of the powerful pumps, and the sparkling reservoirs containing the city's water supply. This was what made it different from other garden spots, and lent excitement and edification to the visit.
